name: Contain the Inevitable Explosion
description:
You are the president's chief body guard and found a ticking time bomb in his vacation cabin. It is inevitable it will explode, but you can try to delay the explosion just long enough to minimize damage. This game has four main endings and many more, ran-out-of time endings. This game was made for Ludum Dare 50, Delay the Inevitable. I probably will polish it up after the jam.

(Note: the score equals the current number of seconds left. I could not find a way to change the label.)

Cover art:

Comic explosion (Kaboom)

Author: Pompei2
